headline.mapping: Map playlist channels to EPG channels

confirm.restore: All data will be replaced with those from the backup. Should the files be restored?

filterGroup.title: Group Title
filterGroup.description:
Select a M3U group. (Counter)
Changing the group title in the M3U invalidates the filter.

include.title: Include
include.description:
Channel name must include.
(Comma separated) Comma means or

exclude.title: Exclude
exclude.description:
Channel name must not contain.
(Comma separated) Comma means or

preserveMapping.title:
Preserve Existing M3U
Channel Numbers
preserveMapping.description: Preserve existing M3U playlist channel numbers?

fileM3U.title: M3U File
fileM3U.placeholder: File path or URL of the M3U

tuner.title: Tuner / Streams
tuner.description:
Number of parallel connections that can be established to the provider.
Only available with activated buffer.
New settings will only be applied after quitting all streams.

fileXMLTV.title: XMLTV File
fileXMLTV.placeholder: File path or URL of the XMLTV

description.title: Channel Description
description.placeholder: Used by the Dummy as an XML description

updateChannelNameRegex.title: Channel name update regex
updateChannelNameRegex.description: On update, if any new channel name matches this regex, rename current channel to the first matching name

updateChannelNameByGroupRegex.title: Only by group regex
updateChannelNameByGroupRegex.description: Rename this channel only if current user-defined group matches this regex

updateChannelGroup.title: Update Channel Group
updateChannelGroup.description: If checked, use group from the database

update.title: Schedule for updating (Playlist, XMLTV, Backup)
update.description: Time in 24 hour format (0800 = 8:00 am). More times can be entered comma separated. Leave this field empty if no updates are to be carried out.

api.title: API Interface
api.description: Via API interface it is possible to send commands to xTeVe. API documentation is here

defaultMissingEPG.title: Fill Missing EPG Data
defaultMissingEPG.description:
When there is no matching EPG data for channel,
autofill with xTeVe dummy EPG data?

enableMappedChannels.title: Enable mapped channels
enableMappedChannels.description: Automatically enable channels with assigned EPG data

disallowURLDuplicates.title: Disallow URL duplicates
disallowURLDuplicates.description: If checked, do not add a new channel from playlist if channel with such URL already exists

epgSource.title: EPG Source
epgSource.description:
PMS:
- Use EPG data from Plex or Emby

XEPG:
- Use of one or more XMLTV files
- Channel management
- M3U / XMLTV export (HTTP link for IPTV apps)

tuner.title: Number of Tuners
tuner.description:
Number of parallel connections that can be established to the provider.
Available for: Plex, Emby (HDHR), M3U (with active buffer).
After a change, xTeVe must be delete in the Plex / Emby DVR settings and set up again.

hostIP.title: Host IP
hostIP.description: IP address xTeVe will use to form M3U and XMLTV files

tlsMode.title: TLS (HTTPS) mode
tlsMode.description:
Changes web server protocol to HTTPS.
For details, see https://github.com/SCP002/xTeVe#tls-mode

filesUpdate.title: Updates all files at startup
filesUpdate.description: Updates all playlists, tuner and XMLTV files at startup.

cacheImages.title: Image Caching
cacheImages.description:
All images from the XMLTV file are cached, allowing faster rendering of the grid in the client.
Downloading the images may take a while and will be done in the background.

replaceEmptyImages.title: Replace missing program images
replaceEmptyImages.description: If the poster in the XMLTV program is missing, the channel logo will be used.

xteveAutoUpdate.title: Automatic update of xTeVe
xteveAutoUpdate.description: If a new version of xTeVe is available, it will be automatically installed. The updates are downloaded from GitHub.

streamBuffering.title: Stream Buffer
streamBuffering.description:
Functions of the buffer:
- The stream is passed from xTeVe, FFmpeg or VLC to Plex, Emby or M3U Player
- Small jerking of the streams can be compensated
- HLS / M3U8 support
- RTP / RTPS support (only FFmpeg or VLC)
- Re-streaming
- Separate tuner limit for each playlist
streamBuffering.info_false: No Buffer (Client connects to the streaming server)
streamBuffering.info_xteve: xTeVe connects to the streaming server
streamBuffering.info_ffmpeg: FFmpeg connects to the streaming server
streamBuffering.info_vlc: VLC connects to the streaming server

udpxy.title: UDPxy address
udpxy.description: The address of your UDPxy server. If set, and the channel URLs in the m3u is multicast, xTeVe will rewrite it so that it is accessed via the UDPxy service.

ffmpegOptions.title: FFmpeg Options
ffmpegOptions.description:
FFmpeg options.
Only change if you know what you are doing.
Leave blank to set default settings.
ffmpegOptions.placeholder: Leave blank to set default settings

vlcOptions.title: VLC / CVLC Options
vlcOptions.description:
VLC / CVLC options.
Only change if you know what you are doing.
Leave blank to set default settings.
vlcOptions.placeholder: Leave blank to set default settings

bufferSize.title: Buffer Size
bufferSize.description:
Buffer size in MB.
M3U8: If the TS segment smaller then the buffer size, the file size of the segment is used.

storeBufferInRAM.title: Store buffer in RAM
storeBufferInRAM.description: If checked, write buffer to RAM instead of writing to disk

bufferTimeout.title: Timeout for new client connections
bufferTimeout.description: The xTeVe buffer waits until new client connections are established. Helpful for fast channel switching. Value in milliseconds.

userAgent.title: User Agent
userAgent.description: User Agent for HTTP requests. For every HTTP connection, this value is used for the user agent. Should only be changed if xTeVe is blocked.

backupPath.title: Location for automatic backups
backupPath.description: Before any update of the provider data by the schedule, xTeVe creates a backup. The path for the automatic backups can be changed. xTeVe requires write permission for this folder.

backupKeep.title: Number of backups to keep
backupKeep.description: Number of backups to keep. Older backups are automatically deleted.

authenticationWEB.title: WEB Authentication
authenticationWEB.description: Access to the web interface only possible with credentials.

authenticationPMS.title: PMS Authentication
authenticationPMS.description:
Plex requests are only possible with authentication.
Warning!!! After activating this function xTeVe must be delete in the PMS DVR settings and set up again.

authenticationM3U.title: M3U Authentication
authenticationM3U.description: Downloading the xteve.m3u file via an HTTP request is only possible with authentication.

authenticationXML.title: XML Authentication
authenticationXML.description: Downloading the xteve.xml file via an HTTP request is only possible with authentication

authenticationAPI.title: API Authentication
authenticationAPI.description: Access to the API interface is only possible with authentication.

epgSource.title: EPG Source
epgSource.description:
PMS:
- Use EPG data from Plex or Emby

XEPG:
- Use of one or more XMLTV files
- Channel management
- M3U / XMLTV export (HTTP link for IPTV apps)

tuner.title: Number of tuners
tuner.description:
Number of parallel connections that can be established to the provider.
Available for: Plex, Emby (HDHR), M3U (with active buffer).
After a change, xTeVe must be delete in the Plex / Emby DVR settings and set up again.

m3u.title: M3U Playlist
m3u.placeholder: File path or URL of the M3U

xmltv.title: XMLTV File
xmltv.placeholder: File path or URL of the XMLTV
